data.title: Berkshire North Registry of Deeds
data.meta_description: Land records for North Adams | Adams | Cheshire | Clarksburg | Florida | Hancock | Lanesborough | New Ashford | Savoy | Williamstown | Windsor
data.text:
NEWLY UPDATED - Consumer Notification Service

The Berkshire North County Registry of Deeds is proud to offer a free notification tool, which alerts homeowners by email when a new document is recorded in their name. If you own real estate in Berkshire North County, use the link below to create an account, and then register up to 3 properties.

Please Note: If you are a homeowner who previously enrolled for a CNS account, you will need to create a new account.

Customer service is our top priority at the Berkshire North County Registry of Deeds. If you believe a document has been recorded fraudulently in your name, please contact us at (413) 743-0035, and one of our customer service specialists will look up the record for you. All victims of fraud should contact local law enforcement authorities.

Consumer Notification Service (Disclaimer)

==========================================

The Berkshire North County District Registry of Deeds, its officers, employees and vendors, assume no liability for failure to provide the requested notice of recorded documents with respect to property for which you are registering to receive notification. The Berkshire North County District Registry of Deeds, its officers, employees and vendors, assumes no liability for fulfilling their legal duty to record documents, even if those documents are in some instances later determined to be erroneous, fraudulent or invalid. The Berkshire North County District Registry of Deeds, its officers, employees and vendors, are not responsible for any damages in connection with use of the information contained herein and provided.

Please note: Because the Consumer Notification Service is necessarily name and not address driven, you may receive alerts for other individuals with the same name in the associated city or town. For more information, please contact the Customer Service Center at (978) 342-2132.

By using this system, you are agreeing to the above disclaimer.
